scenes.background: You are on annual leave, enjoying some well-deserved time off to recharge. However, during your time away, a colleague messages you privately, saying there’s an urgent task that needs immediate attention. The request creates a dilemma as you try to balance respecting your time off while feeling the pressure to help with the urgent task. Your colleague, Mark, messages: 'Hey Alex, I really need your help with this urgent task. Can you help me out?' You decided to help Mark with the urgent task despite being on leave. You've now finished the task and informed Mark about it. Later, [Monica] and [Bob] hear about this and have some thoughts. [Monica] comments, 'I can't believe you agreed to work on your leave, Alex. Don't you think you need to set better boundaries?' while [Bob] adds, 'Yeah, you're always the one stepping in. What if they start expecting it all the time?' You responded, 'I get what you're saying, but I felt it was necessary this time. I'll be more careful in the future.' [Monica] nods thoughtfully and says, 'I understand, but it's important to take care of yourself too.' [Bob] shrugs, 'Well, it's done now. Let's just hope it doesn't become a trend.' You replied, 'I agree, but sometimes you just have to do what feels right in the moment.' [Monica] looks at you, concerned, 'But Alex, if you keep doing this, they might start taking advantage of your kindness.' [Bob] adds, 'Yeah, and what about your own mental health?'
scenes.description: [Monica] sighs, 'We’re just worried about you, Alex. You deserve your time off.' [Bob] nods, 'Yeah, you can't always be the go-to person for emergencies. It’s not fair to you.'

options.text: I understand, but sometimes work doesn't wait. I'll just be more selective next time.
options.analysis: You showed good emotional perception and social skills by acknowledging their concerns, but your self-regulation and motivation to set boundaries need improvement.

options.text: I get it, but I can't just ignore urgent tasks. They needed me this time.
options.analysis: You balanced your response by explaining your actions, showing moderate self-regulation, but your empathy and emotional perception towards their concerns were lower.

options.text: Maybe you're right. I'll make sure to set stricter boundaries moving forward.
options.analysis: You acknowledged their concerns and showed high empathy and self-regulation, but your motivation to handle urgent tasks might be questioned.
